name: Resonance
appearance: Ancient being of sound and vibration. Ethereal form of shimmering sound waves, no fixed shape.

name: Verdance
appearance: Ancient being of growth. Living plant matter forming a humanoid shape, flowers and vines.

name: Luminos
appearance: Ancient being of light. Radiant crystalline form, faceted like a prism, warm golden glow.

name: Kinesis
appearance: Ancient being of motion. Blur of perpetual movement, streaks of color suggesting speed.
